HIS BRIT; NNIC MAJESTY'SGOVERNMENT)SECRET COPY NO.C.P.(U6) 5685T.U OCTOBER, 19U-6CABINETEMPLOYMENT OF JUDGESNote by the Prime MinisterMinisters are reminded that they should notapproach Judges for extra-judicial work without consulting the Lord Chancellor.C.R.A.10, Downing Street, S.Vv. 1.5th October, 19u7,
